titles.title: 713 Fierce Was The Wild Billow (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fierce was the wild billow
Dark was the night
Oars laboured heavily
Foam glimmered white
Trembled the mariners
Peril was nigh
Then said the God of God
Peace it is I

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ridge of the mountain-wave
Lower thy crest
Wail of the hurricane
Be thou at rest
Sorrow can never be
Darkness must fly
Where saith the Light of Light
Peace it is I

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus Deliverer
Nigh to us be
Soothe thou my voyaging
Over Life's sea
Thou when the storm of death
Roars sweeping by
Whisper O Truth of Truth
Peace it is I
